PV.content:

* "-3.12 eV"

This value is associated with the property "LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital)" of the chemical compound "4b." Therefore, "LUMO" can also be considered a property value entity in this context.

To summarize, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* "-3.12 eV" (LUMO of 4b)
* "LUMO" (property name)
